title: Alpha Graph Engine — G3 Golden Sample Audit Complete

G3-1_SANITY_CHECK_HISTORICAL_LOGIC_TRACE.requirement: Verify causal chains against 3 historically documented market events

events_audited.documented_fact: Fed launched emergency QE ($2.3T), cut rates to near-zero
events_audited.causal_chain_traced: NODE_LIQUIDITY (+960 surge) → LEADS → STATE_BTC (21d lag) → AMPLIFIES → ASSET_BTC recovery. NODE_GRAVITY (drops to -0.45) → reduced INHIBITION → supports recovery.
events_audited.alignment_with_history: VERIFIED - Graph correctly captured Fed QE injection leading crypto recovery

events_audited.documented_fact: FTX declared bankruptcy Nov 11. Fed maintained tight monetary policy (rates elevated).
events_audited.causal_chain_traced: NODE_LIQUIDITY (negative/contracting at -97 to -139) → bearish signal. NODE_GRAVITY (elevated 1.4+) → INHIBITS → STATE_BTC/ETH → suppressed recovery.
events_audited.alignment_with_history: VERIFIED - Graph correctly captured tight monetary conditions during crisis

events_audited.documented_fact: Bitcoin spot ETFs approved Jan 10, 2024. Market rallied on institutional inflows.
events_audited.causal_chain_traced: NODE_LIQUIDITY (turns positive, +88 by Feb) → LEADS → bullish STATE_BTC → AMPLIFIES → ASSET_BTC rally. Moderate GRAVITY → limited INHIBITION.
events_audited.alignment_with_history: VERIFIED - Graph correctly captured improving liquidity conditions during ETF rally

G3-1_SANITY_CHECK_HISTORICAL_LOGIC_TRACE.overall_verdict: ALL 3 HISTORICAL EVENTS VERIFIED - No reasoning chain contradicts documented facts
